div.l: Men myght here hire routyng tho furlong
The wenche routith eke par companye
Aleyn the clerke that herd this melodie
He pokid Iohn and saide slepestetoweslepestetoweslepestetow
Herdist thou eủere swiche a song er nowe
Lo swiche a couplyng is by twixte hem all
A wilde fire I pray on hir bodies falle
Ho herde euer swilke a ferly thinge
He they schall haue the floure of euyl endyng
This long nyght ne tidith me no reste
But yit no forse al schall be for the best
For Iohn saide he as eủere mote I thriue
Yif that I may yon wenche wille I swiue
Som esement has lawe I schapyn vs
For iohn ther is a lawe that sayth thus
That yif a man in o point fore be agreuyd
That in a nothir he schal be releuyd
Oure corne is I stole sothely hit is no may may nay
And we han an ille fitte all this day
And synne I schall haue non othir amendement
A gayn my losse I wol haue esement
Bi godis sowle hit schal non othir bee
This ihon Iohnihon Iohn answerid aleyn avise the
The Miller is for sothe a perilous man he saide
And yif that he out of his slepe
Til he so nygh was er sche myght a spie
That hit hadde ben to late for to crie
And schortly for to seie they were a ton
Now playn playplayn play Aleyn for I wolle speke of iohn
¶ This Iohn lieth stille a forlong wey or too
And to hym self he makith rewthe and woo
Allas quoth hee this is a wikkid iape
Now may I sayn that I is but and anandan ape
Yit hath my felaw somwhat for his harme
He hath the Myllers doughtir in his arme
He Aunteride hym and hath his nedis spedd
And I le le lie as a draf sak here in my bedde
And whenne this iape is tolde an nothir day
I schall be holde a daffe and a kokenay
I wolle a rise and auntre hit by my faith
Vnhardy is vnseli thus men saith
And vp he ros and softly he wente
And bar And bar But to the Cradill and in his hond hit hente
And bar hit softe vnto his beddis fete
Sone aftir this wif hir routyng lete
